name: That Time I got sucked into a computer game
name_original: That Time I got sucked into a computer game
description:
Boasting around 1.5 hours of gameplay! 

4 Teenagers try one last game during a sleep over, the console breaks and the teenagers get warped into a new world, where they are trapped until they can solve the worlds problem. Saving the gods from imprisment from Vantis an evil overlord. Whom seeks to dominate Valoria. The Heroes must climb the tower, and conquer several dungeon floors, all with their own unique setting, saving the gods of the realm. And uncovering the truth, before them. Will the heroes ever get to the real world again?
